title: The Book of Kells
description: The Book of Kells is a richly decorated manuscript created by Celtic monks around the 9th century, containing the four Gospels of the New Testament. Renowned for its intricate illustrations, vivid colors, and elaborate calligraphy, it represents the height of early medieval art.
